description.value:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7sso1g3AAejpZ8ar]{Dueling Parry}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.r72qcTupGzyRDiGe]{Duelist Dedication}

You protect those near you with a flash of steel. When youâ€™re benefiting from Dueling Parry, allies adjacent to you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC. 

If you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mf2cdCRV8uowOMOm]{Dueling Riposte}, you can use it when an enemy within your reach critically fails a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} against an ally adjacent to you, not just against yourself.
